title: TTT Batch 2: Cross-Pattern Coordination and Systematic Integration
description: Meta-analysis of coordination between different corruption mechanisms identified in TTT articles 46-90. Examines how Schedule F implementation, DOJ weaponization, military politicization, election infrastructure capture, oversight obstruction, and media suppression coordinate and integrate. Research inter-agency coordination, timing synchronization, resource sharing, and systematic corruption architecture. Focus on coordination mechanisms, command structures, and systematic integration patterns.
